OpenSim::BodyScale

BodyScale Class Reference

#include <BodyScale.h>

Inheritance diagram for BodyScale:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing a set of parameters describing how to scale a body segment.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
